QuestData.Title: Story of a Memorable Victory
QuestData.Description:
That was a good fight!
Elder Poa in Iskaara will be interested in listening to the story of that victory.
QuestData.LogDescription: Tell the story of your victory to Elder Poa in Iskaara.
QuestData.RewardText:
What's that? You have a story for me? Sit down, let me hear it!
<Elder Poa listens to your tale of a victory over a peculiar foe.>
That was thrilling! Thank you for sharing that with me, young one.
